headline: KKR Increases Ownership Stake in Altavair
summary: NEW YORK & SEATTLE, January 19, 2026--KKR, a leading global investment firm, and Altavair, a leader in commercial aviation leasing and financing, today announced a definitive agreement under which KKR will increase its ownership stake in Altavair and its sister company, AV AirFinance. KKR will fund the investment from its balance sheet.
